survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee perceptions of mental health support and resources provided by their organization.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall mental health support provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall mental health support provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources does your employer offer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all relevant resources.

script.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources does your employer offer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you utilize the mental health resources provided by your employer?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to gauge engagement with resources.

script.question_text: How often do you utilize the mental health resources provided by your employer?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from using the mental health resources provided by your employer?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from using the mental health resources provided by your employer?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q3

questions.question_text: How comfortable do you feel discussing mental health with your manager or supervisor?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure comfort levels.

script.question_text: How comfortable do you feel discussing mental health with your manager or supervisor?

questions.question_text: Has your employer provided training or education on mental health awareness?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge awareness initiatives.

script.question_text: Has your employer provided training or education on mental health awareness?

questions.question_text: If yes, how effective was the mental health training or education provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure effectiveness.

script.question_text: If yes, how effective was the mental health training or education provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: What additional mental health resources or support would you like your employer to provide?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for improvement.

script.question_text: What additional mental health resources or support would you like your employer to provide?

questions.question_text: How has your employer's mental health support impacted your overall job satisfaction?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure impact on job satisfaction.

script.question_text: How has your employer's mental health support impacted your overall job satisfaction?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your employer to others based on their mental health support?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure recommendation likelihood.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your employer to others based on their mental health support?
